title: Global leading kiwi producing countries 2017
yAxis: Production volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production volume in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The maximum Production volume in thousand metric tons 2024.6 is found at Country China mainland and the minimum is found at United States of America where Country is 30.48.
There is a difference of 1994.12 between the maximum Country China mainland and minimum Country United States of America.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production volume in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Production volume in thousand metric tons is highest at Country China mainland and lowest at Country United States of America.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production volume in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Production volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Production volume in thousand metric tons 2024.6 is found at Country China mainland and the minimum is found at United States of America where Country is 30.48.
Second maximum Production volume in thousand metric tons is found at Country Italy.
The highest Country China mainland has 1994.12 more Production volume in thousand metric tons than the lowest Country United States of America.
The Country China mainland has the highest Production volume in thousand metric tons, followed by Italy, and New Zealand. Down to the Country United States of America which is the lowest.
The Country United States of America tends to be 5.09 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 3976.04.
